definitions.title: adv.
definitions.body: (late) already (freq. in Mish. and NH; Targum [[כבר]] (rare); Syr. kbar usu. perhaps, occas. already (Mt 11:21 Hb 10:2); Mand. [[כבאר]] already, Nö:M. p. 202. Der. uncertain, connexion with √ [[כבר]] being dub.)—already, Ec 1:10 [[כְּבָר]] [[הָיׇה]] it hath already been, Ec 2:12, Ec 2:16, Ec 3:15, Ec 3:15, Ec 4:2, Ec 6:10, Ec 9:6, Ec 9:7.
